text: Ana Đurić (née Ignjatović; born 12 October 1978), known professionally as Konstrakta is a Serbian singer and songwriter. She became famous as the lead vocalist of the indie pop band Zemlja gruva!, which was founded in 2007. In 2019, Konstrakta decided to pursue a solo career. Konstrakta represented Serbia at the Eurovision Song Contest 2022 in Turin, Italy with "In corpore sano". She finished 5th out of the 40 competing countries that year. == References == Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Serbian singers
title: Konstrakta
